Control.ttp: xxThis page is for maintaining information related to 'System Settings'.
xxClick to display online help related to this page...
xxClick to save the contents of this page to the current device...
xxClick to refresh the contents of this page...
xxClick to immediately refresh the 'Machine Date Time' on the device using the chosen 'Internet Time Server'.
xxClick to reset the contents of this page to what it was after the last save...
xxProvides multiple choices for Internet time server.

Control.lbl: xxAutomatically adjust clock for Daylight Saving Time
Control.ttp: xxWhen checkmarked, the clock on the PAC will automatically be adjusted for 'Daylight Saving Time'.

Control.lbl: xxSync with an Internet Time Server (Reboot Required)
Control.ttp: xxSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time received from an internet time server. (A reboot is initially required once enabled)
xxSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
xxProvides the amount of time to wait for the next synchronization to take place between the internet time server and the PAC..

Messages.Message: xxThe System Settings cannot be saved since the specified Machine Name: '{0}' already exists on this network.
xx'Machine Name' must be at least 4 characters in length.
xx'Machine Name' must begin with a character and end with either a character or a number.
xxAre you sure you want to Reboot the PAC?
xx'Internet Time Server' must be at least 4 characters in length.
xx'Internet Time Server' must be provided.
xx'Refresh Interval' must be at least 5 minutes and no more than 2 weeks.
xxTo effectively initiate the changes made to the current System Settings, it is recommended that you reboot the PAC...
